greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) read by rows: Number of order-reversing full contraction mappings (of an n-chain) with 1 fixed point and height exactly k.
reference: A. D. Adeshola, V. Maltcev and A. Umar, Combinatorial results for certain semigroups of order-preserving full contraction mappings of a finite chain, (submitted).
example: T (4,6) = 6 because there are exactly 6 order-reversing full contraction mappings (of a 4-chain) with 1 fixed point and of height exactly 2, namely: (3222), (2221), (2211), (4433), (4333), (3332).
results.author: _Abdullahi Umar_, Feb 28 2013
